Name: CO2 ABSORBER FILTER REPLACEMENT
checklistText:
<size=21>CO2 Absorber Filter Replacement</size>

Open CO2 cstr atten pnl

Panel 350:
	CO2 CSTR DIVERT vlv 			- up (or dn)

Remarks:
	Air flows through if handles points towards the middle of the two 
	assemblies.

Replace A:
	Move handle to right
	Press C and press "REPLACE CANNISTER"
	Move handle to left

Replace B:
	Move handle to left
	Press C and press "REPLACE CANNISTER"
	Move handle to right

Original procedures (bypass these for now)
			CAUTION

		Apply press to latching handle
		to allow press interlock pin to
		withdraw, otherwise latching
		handle may not disengage.

		Cstr man bleed vlv - press
		Cover latching handle - unlock
		Replace used filter
		Cover latching handle - lock
		CO2 CSTR DIVERT vlv - ctr
		Close CO2 cstr atten pnl
		Stow used filter
		Stow excess shims in volume B5 or B6
